info.title: TigerConnect Message API
info.description: The message system for TigerConnect messaging platform.

post.summary: Send a message to a User or Group.
post.description: Send a message to a User or Group. The parameters to be included either on the JSON object or the POST body itself. If no recipient is found, a new account is created and the message is sent to the associated email or phone number if available.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A JSON Array of user-defined datum elements, each one with the following fields, if no data then this will be empty

parameters.name: dor
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating that the message will be deleted on read

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: The recipient User or Group based on address encoding

parameters.name: ttl
parameters.description: An integer value with the number of minutes until the message expires. -1 indicates no expiration

204.description: The message was sent. In that case a header will be included in the response: TT-X-Message-Id: The generated message token

400.description: The provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: The recipient was not found. A proper description of the error will be provided

put.summary: Update the status of a message or several messages.
put.description: Update the status of a message or several messages.

parameters.name: delivered
parameters.description: A list of message tokens to set status to Delivered

parameters.name: read
parameters.description: A list of message tokens to set status to Read

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: The recipient was not found. A proper description of the error will be provided

get.summary: Notify a recipient that a particular User is typing in a conversation.
get.description: Notify a recipient that a particular User is typing in a conversation.

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: The recipient is either another User or Group using address encoding

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: The recipient was not found. A proper description of the error will be provided

delete.summary: Notify a recipient that the User is no longer typing in a conversation.
delete.description: Notify a recipient that the User is no longer typing in a conversation. The recipient is either another User or Group using address encoding.

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: The recipient was not found. A proper description of the error will be provided

get.summary: Retrieves the attachment from the message.
get.description: Retrieves the attachment from the message. Currently we only support one attachment per message. if found. It returns the attached file.

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: Message is not found or it has no attachment

200.description: Returns if the attachment is found

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: Message is not found or it has no attachment

200.description: Message information with the following fields

delete.summary: Recalls the message with the following message token.
delete.description: Recalls the message with the following message token. If the message was already recalled, no error is reported.

400.description: If the provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: Message is not found or it has no attachment

post.summary: Forward the message to the following User or Group.
post.description: Forward the message to the following User or Group.

parameters.name: recipient_token
parameters.description: The recipient User or Group token based on address encoding

204.description: The message was correctly sent. In that case a header will be included in the response: TT-X-Message-Id: The generated message token

400.description: The provided parameters are somehow incorrect. A proper description of the error will be provided

404.description: The recipient was not found. A proper description of the error will be provided

recipient_token.description: The recipient User or Group token

created_time.description: Message creation time according to the server

ttl.description: An integer value with the number of minutes until the message expires. -1 indicates no expiration

dor.description: Boolean value indicating that the message will be deleted on read

status.description: The message status. Possible values: New, Delivered, Read

attachments.description: A JSON Array of attachment objects, each one with the following fields, if no attachment then this will be empty:
